allow: Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python chart/index_chart.py data/sealed_time_series.csv data/single_time_series.csv --dbs-period 7)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python chart/index_aggregator.py data/output.csv --name test_debug --sets "SV01,SV02" --types "Card" --verbose)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python chart/index_aggregator.py --name test_analysis --sets "SV*" --types "Card" --period "3M" --verbose data/output.csv)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python chart/index_aggregator.py --name test_failure --sets "SWSH*,SV*" --types "Card" --period "3M" --verbose data/output.csv)
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python chart/index_aggregator.py --name test_fallback --sets "SWSH*,SV*" --types "Card" --period "3M" --allow-fallback --verbose data/output.csv)

Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python -c "
from pathlib import Path
from common.coverage_analyzer import CoverageAnalyzer
analyzer = CoverageAnalyzer(input_csv=Path(''test_data/nonexistent.csv''))
result = analyzer.analyze_filter_combination(sets=''SV*'', types=''Card'', period=''3M'')
print(f''Coverage: {result.coverage_percentage}'')
print(f''Signatures found: {result.signatures_found}'')
print(f''Quality score: {result.quality_score}'')
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=. pipenv run python -c "
from common.coverage_analyzer import CoverageAnalyzer
analyzer = CoverageAnalyzer()
recommendations = analyzer.discover_viable_configurations(min_coverage=0.9, max_recommendations=3)
print(f''Found {len(recommendations)} recommendations with 90%+ coverage:'')
for i, rec in enumerate(recommendations):
    print(f''{i+1}. {rec.description} - Coverage: {rec.coverage_result.coverage_percentage:.1%} - Records: {rec.estimated_records}'')
")
